alert.note: Alert for Clay; Owen; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:50AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Clay, northwestern Owen and southwestern Putnam Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1150 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Brazil to 12 miles west of Spencer. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Clay, northwestern Owen and southwestern Putnam Counties, including the following locations... Center Point, Patricksburg, Reelsville, Cagles Mill Lake, Devore and Bowling Green. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 26 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
